instruction:
Fix: returns a reference to data owned by the current function

Buggy code:
```rust
fn get_str() -> &str { let s = String::from("hello"); &s }
```

Fix: returns a reference to data owned by the current function

Buggy code:
```rust
fn make_greeting(name: &str) -> &str { let s = format!("Hello, {}!", name); &s }
```

Fix: returns a reference to data owned by the current function
